core.cpu

Class CPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.cpu.CPU

  • public class CPU
extends java.lang.Object
    Fetches an instruction from memory pointed to by the Program Counter then parses and executes the instruction.
    Author:
    Daniel Simpkins

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean error
      Indicates an error occurred in the CPU.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CPU(java.lang.String biosFile, java.lang.String romName)
      Handles all CPU emulation including registers, flags, fetch-execute cycles, and memory management.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dumpRegisters()
      Displays 16-bit registers.

      Reads memory pointed to by Program Counter, parses the instruction, and executes it.

      Pops a byte from the stack.

      Pops a Word from the stack.

      Pushes a byte into the stack.

      • CPU

        public CPU(java.lang.String biosFile,
           java.lang.String romName)
        Handles all CPU emulation including registers, flags, fetch-execute cycles, and memory management.
        Parameters:
        biosFile - Path to the BIOS binary.
        romName - Path to the ROM dump.
